titles: The Christian mans care A sermon on Matth. 6. 33. Together with a short catechisme for the simpler sort. By Thomas Gataker, B. of D. and pastor of Rotherhith.
author: Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland, for Fulke Clifton, and are to be sold at his shop upon new Fishstreet Hill,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
